column4: i've tried installing and uninstalling driver skeaper configuration
i got the pc in the next room
every channel i go into is dead
any ideas on how to stop that
this might work On the terminal sudo gedit /etc/init.d/halt Add the following line to the halt script rmmod snd-hda-intel
this is fix for shutdown bug http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1306789
